txt.en:
The dwarf catches his breath.

'I... I am surprised to be alive. I am Drengur. Have you come to search for me and my companions? I fear they are all dead. We were ambushed on the path. I ran into the ruins and found myself in an old spider cave. Little did I know that those beasts dwelled there as well!

'I was lost, hiding myself from worms and drakes. And then... and then I saw her. A dragon, slumbering in the caves! It is true! We must leave this place at once. I only escaped the tunnels thanks to your distraction.'

The dwarf catches his breath.

'I... I am surprised to be alive, and surprised to see an [placeholder] in Stormwall. I am Drengur. Have you come to search for me and my companions? I fear they are all dead. We were ambushed on the path. I ran into the ruins and found myself in an old spider cave. Little did I know that those beasts dwelled there as well!

'I was lost, hiding myself from worms and drakes. And then... and then I saw her. A dragon, slumbering in the caves! It is true! We must leave this place at once. I only escaped the tunnels thanks to your distraction.'

The dwarf catches his breath.

'I... I am surprised to be alive, and surprised to see a [placeholder] in Stormwall. I am Drengur. Have you come to search for me and my companions? I fear they are all dead. We were ambushed on the path. I ran into the ruins and found myself in an old spider cave. Little did I know that those beasts dwelled there as well!

'I was lost, hiding myself from worms and drakes. And then... and then I saw her. A dragon, slumbering in the caves! It is true! We must leave this place at once. I only escaped the tunnels thanks to your distraction.'
You should speak with the dwarf.
Deep within Stormwall lies a fiery secret, slumbering in the shadows.
